blog.name: racheloutoflove
blog.title: My Magical Place
blog.description:
Hufflepuff | INFJ | Fangirl | Writer | Reader

I love reading and watching tv/movies and food makes me happy!

This is my safe place because out there social anxiety sucks! :(

All my hogwarts houses posts

My Taylor Swift fan blog

| My Choices Blog | Instagram | Twitter

body:
Ask me anything!

Hey everyone!

I feel like doing an ask me anything, it looks so much fun so please if you have any questions leave them in the ‘ask me anything’ box. It can be Harry Potter related, personal questions or basically anything you want! (I mostly spend my time reading books or watching tv shows and movies so you’re welcome to ask about those too.)

And also I wanted to thank all of you for all the love and for liking and sharing my posts, I get excited every time I get tumblr notification. So I would love if you send me your questions and thank you again!!! 💚💙💛❤️

reblog.comment:

body:
Drarry binge read

After struggling to enjoy reading Drarry for quite a lot of 2018, the last two days of the year have seen me go on a spontaneous fic reading binge!

The fics I’ve read are wonderfully angsty, fluffy, cracky, festive, and a million other things. Here’s a list, in case you’re like me and want to get back into Drarry but need a bit of a prod:

Adventures in Solitude (Are You There, Sirius? It’s Me, Draco) by @oceaxereturns

Tug-O-Want by @dysonrules

The Baltimore Stone by @drarrymylove

Assuming the Best by @buttertyrant

The Magic of the Holidays, or, How I Survived the Gringotts Holiday Helpdesk by @noeeon

These are shared in the order I read them and I’ll reblog with any extra fics I manage to squeeze into this year!

summary:
Hermione: What’s your New Year resolution, Harry? 
Harry *staring at Draco*: Drac-
Ron *external screaming*:...
body:
Hermione: What’s your New Year resolution, Harry?

Harry *staring at Draco*: Drac-

Ron *external screaming*: NO!


*Meanwhile*


Pansy: What’s your New Year resolution?

Draco: I thought you knew

Pansy: Well last year you said you want him to bang you, is it still the same?

Draco *staring intensely at Harry*: Hmm, wait what did you just say?

Pansy: …Jesus fuck

summary:
Harry: What's your New Year resolution?
Draco: I think I should be meaner... I was too kind this year
Harry: ... I hope you fail...
body:
Harry: What's your New Year resolution?
Draco: I think I should be meaner... I was too kind this year
Harry: ... I hope you fail at your resolution... for the greater good

summary: when alan rickman was 64 years old, he played severus snape at 38 years old.

that’s a 26 year difference.

that’s also known as “skill.”

summary:
*Draco walks past*
Harry: I would tap that
Ron: You mean punch? 
Harry: No, I would tap his arse
Ron: Making him think you like...
body:
*Draco walks past*

Harry: I would tap that

Ron: You mean punch?

Harry: No, I would tap his arse

Ron: Making him think you like him, then betray him! Good idea mate!

Harry: No. I would tap his arse, then kiss him, then take him home.

Ron: To… Murder.. Him?

Harry: ….

Ron:…

Ron: I didn’t need to know that Harry.

Heya! This is an account that automatically posts new James/Lily fanfics!
icon made by @willhsrondale on twitter

title: Enchaîné
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RmHJQe

by Blihioma

Three-Fic / Harry ne possède pas sa propre liberté. Celle-ci est entre les mains d'une autre personne, entre les mains du fils d'Odin, Thor. Il n'a que huit ans lorsqu'il rencontre le tout jeune Dieu du Tonnerre, mais surtout quand il rencontrera Loki Laufeyson, pour qui son coeur se met à se battre plus fort. Mais l'amour n'est pas simple entre un esclave et un prince

Words: 6487, Chapters: 1/3, Language: Français

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling, Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Loki (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Hermione Granger, Ron Weasley, Godric Gryffindor, Severus Snape
  • Relationships: Loki (Marvel)/Harry Potter, Loki/Thor (Marvel), James Potter/Lily Evans Potter
  • Additional Tags: Romance, Master/Slave, Slave Harry, Arranged Marriage, Marriage of Convenience, Emotional Hurt/Comfort


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RmHJQe
